comments: By far one of the most understanding, compassionate, and knowledgable instructors I have had to date. I consider myself EXTREMELY lucky to have had Mr. Ead as my instructor for my pediatrics clinical!

Best clinical instructor I\'ve ever had. This guy is the man. He\'s funny, will help you out in every way. The hospital staff loves him as well, so that makes it easier on students. Very flexible with handing in assignments. I never felt like I was under pressure but I learned a great deal.
